      static void dropdownSelectItem(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver, java.lang.String sLocator, java.lang.String sLog, SelectionBy selectionBy, java.lang.String parentElementId, java.lang.String sValue, boolean bException) 
      static boolean enter_DOM(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element, java.lang.String sLog, java.lang.String sValue, java.lang.String sJavaScript, boolean bException)
      This method adds a node to the DOM before clearing & entering the value into the field and TABs off to generate AJAX call and waits for the AJAX call to complete

      Notes:
      1) JavaScript must add the same node as getTempUniqueNode()
      2) No need to manually remove node upon failure as method handles this.
      3) An exception can still be thrown just not related to AJAX timeout

      • getJS_AddNodeToDOM

        Parameters:

      • wasNodeRemovedFromDOM

        public static boolean wasNodeRemovedFromDOM(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver,
                            java.lang.String sLocator)
        Determines if the element specified was removed from the DOM before timeout.

        Note:
        1) This method should be used in conjunction with the method addNodeToDOM which adds a temp node to the DOM
        Parameters:
        driver -
        sLocator - - How to find the element that is to be removed
        Returns:
        true if node was removed from the DOM else false

      • removeNodeFromDOM

        public static void removeNodeFromDOM(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver,
                     java.lang.String sID)
        Uses javascript to remove a node from the DOM. The purpose of this is to then trigger the AJAX which adds the node back at which time the AJAX request is complete

        Notes:
        1) The javascript only works for ID. If no ID exists, then different javascript to add the node will be needed.
        2) This method needs to be called before the action that triggers the AJAX update.
        Parameters:
        driver -
        sID - - ID of node to be deleted

      • getJS_AddNodeToDOM

        public static java.lang.String getJS_AddNodeToDOM(java.lang.String sParentID,
                                  java.lang.String sNewChildNodeID)
        Constructs the JavaScript to add a new child node to the specified parent node
        Parameters:
        sParentID - - ID of node where the new child node will be added to the DOM
        sNewChildNodeID - - Unique value for both the child node name and ID to be added to the DOM
        Returns:

      • enterText

        public static void enterText(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element,
             java.lang.String sLog,
             java.lang.String sValue,
             java.lang.String parentElementId,
             boolean bException)

      • enter_DOM

        public static boolean enter_DOM(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element,
                java.lang.String sLog,
                java.lang.String sValue,
                java.lang.String sJavaScript,
                boolean bException)
        This method adds a node to the DOM before clearing & entering the value into the field and TABs off to generate AJAX call and waits for the AJAX call to complete

        Notes:
        1) JavaScript must add the same node as getTempUniqueNode()
        2) No need to manually remove node upon failure as method handles this.
        3) An exception can still be thrown just not related to AJAX timeout
        Parameters:
        element - - Element to enter text
        sLog - - Element name to log
        sValue - - Value to enter into the field
        sJavaScript - - JavaScript to add the node to the DOM
        bException - - true if you want an exception thrown in the case that AJAX does not complete before timeout occurs
        Returns:
        true if successful else false

      • clickLink

        public static void clickLink(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver,
             java.lang.String sLocator,
             java.lang.String sLog,
             java.lang.String parentElementId,
             boolean bException)

      • click_DOM

        public static boolean click_DOM(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver,
                java.lang.String sLocator,
                java.lang.String sLog,
                java.lang.String sJavaScript,
                boolean bException)
        This method adds a node to the DOM using the specified JavaScript before clicking the option and waiting for the node to removed. (Recommended Method)

        Notes:
        1) Javascript must add the same node as getTempUniqueNode()
        2) No need to manually remove node upon failure as method handles this.
        3) An exception can still be thrown just not related to AJAX timeout
        Parameters:
        driver - - Web Driver
        sLocator - - How to find the option to click
        sLog - - Element Name to log
        sJavaScript - - JavaScript to add the node to the DOM
        bException - - true if you want an exception thrown in the case that AJAX does not complete before timeout occurs
        Returns:
        true if successful else false

      • dropdownSelectItem

        public static void dropdownSelectItem(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver,
                      java.lang.String sLocator,
                      java.lang.String sLog,
                      SelectionBy selectionBy,
                      java.lang.String parentElementId,
                      java.lang.String sValue,
                      boolean bException)

      • dropdownSelectItem_DOM

        public static boolean dropdownSelectItem_DOM(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver,
                             java.lang.String sLocator,
                             java.lang.String sLog,
                             SelectionBy selectionBy,
                             java.lang.String sJavaScript,
                             java.lang.String sValue,
                             boolean bException)
        This method adds a node to the DOM using the specified JavaScript before selecting the option and waiting for the node to removed as necessary. (Recommended Method)

        Notes:
        1) Javascript must add the same node as getTempUniqueNode()
        2) No need to manually remove node upon failure as method handles this.
        3) An exception can still be thrown just not related to AJAX timeout
        Parameters:
        driver - - Web Driver
        sLocator - - How to find the drop down to work with
        sLog - - Element Name to log
        sJavaScript - - JavaScript to add the node to the DOM
        dropdown - - The drop down option to be selected
        bException - - true if you want an exception thrown in the case that AJAX does not complete before timeout occurs
        Returns:
        true if successful else false

      • checkbox

        public static void checkbox(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element,
            java.lang.String sLog,
            boolean bCheck,
            java.lang.String parentElementId,
            boolean bException)

      • checkbox_DOM

        public static boolean checkbox_DOM(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element,
                   java.lang.String sLog,
                   boolean bCheck,
                   java.lang.String sJavaScript,
                   boolean bException)
        This method adds a node to the DOM before selecting/unselecting the check box and TABs off to generate AJAX call and waits for the AJAX call to complete. (Recommended Method)

        Notes:
        1) JavaScript must add the same node as getTempUniqueNode()
        2) No need to manually remove node upon failure as method handles this.
        3) An exception can still be thrown just not related to AJAX timeout
        4) Check box only selected or unselected if it generates an AJAX call
        5) Verifies that check box is enabled
        Parameters:
        element - - Check box element
        sLog - - Element name to log
        bCheck - - true to make check box selected after method else false
        sJavaScript - - JavaScript to add the node to the DOM
        bException - - true if you want an exception thrown in the case that AJAX does not complete before timeout occurs
        Returns:
        true if successful else false
